text: Hey!
So, we just wrapped up our second day at VidCon here in California.
Um, yesterday we had a Brain Scoop Q&A where we had
a lot of people come and ask a bunch of questions for Michael and I.
Um, and then we had a couple hours of signings and meetups,
and I got to meet a lot of people who watch the show.
Um, and I just got back from the EDU panel that we had
with John Green, um, Derrick from Veritasium, and Destin from Smarter Every Day.
And I just wanna say that I am floored.
I am totally amazed by the amount of people who were in that room
and the amount of people who were trying to get into the room,
because they had to turn people away.
Um, the line was so long, and so many people wanted to be in this EDU panel
and ask questions, and that is so invigorating for me.
And I just wanted to make a quick message to say thank you to everybody who was there.
And, to say thank you for the people who, who can't be here.
Um, because without you guys, we wouldn't be doing this.
Without you guys to help fuel this machine, to help keep turning the wheels in this project that we have going
um, it would not be possible without your help, and your support, and your love, and your devotion
to- to making good, quality educational content that is free and accessible to so many people worldwide.
Just being at VidCon, I am fully seeing this, um, kinda for the first time.
And it's just been amazing to me. Um, I'm so humbled and I am so grateful
for all of you who watch the channel, who- and who have supported us so far.
Um, I just wanna say, we have some really exciting things coming, um,
on the Brain Scoop, and we're in the middle of editing a lot of footage,
so, I just wanted to make a message to say thanks, and I am so happy to be on this journey with you.
So, thank you all for your support. It means the world to me.
